snippet.title: HD 174884: a strongly eccentric, short-period early-type binary system discovered by CoRoT
snippet.description: HD 174884: a strongly eccentric, short-period early-type binary system discovered by CoRoT / Maceroni, C ; Montalban, J ; Michel, E ; Harmanec, P ; Prsa, A ; Briquet, M ; Niemczura, E ; Morel, T ; Ladjal, D ; Auvergne, M et al. Accurate photometric CoRoT space observations of a secondary seismological target, HD 174884, led to the discovery that this star is an astrophysically important double-lined eclipsing spectroscopic binary in an eccentric orbit (e of about 0.3), unusual for its short (3.65705d) orbital period. [...] arXiv:0910.3513. \- 2009\. Preprint
